sql: select * from lte_cluster_question where data_source not like'%ATU%'

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ${tableName} ( intid int8, vctsid varchar, dttstime timestamp, vccity varchar, vcarea varchar, vctsmsg varchar, vctstype varchar, vcaddress varchar, vcnettype varchar, flong float8, flat float8, vcgridid varchar, vcchgrid varchar, inttsnum int8, vcaffectarea varchar, vcyhgrid varchar, vcjlplbnum varchar, intjlcount int8, vcjlcity varchar, fjllonb float8, fjllat float8, vccgi varchar, intdateid int8, vcdatasource varchar, vcjlgridid varchar, vcfilename varchar, vcquestiontype varchar, first_analysis varchar, first_proposal varchar, reason_classifyvarchar, first_proposal_type varchar, detail_analysis varchar, detail_proposal varchar, detail_reason varchar, detail_proposal_type varchar, trim_village varchar, property varchar, target varchar, order_state varchar, is_solved varchar, vcordercode varchar, createtime timestamp, problemstatus varchar )location ('${filePath}') format 'csv' (delimiter '|' null '') log errors into err_sales_ext_t segment reject limit 1000 rows

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ${tableName} ( intid int8, vctsid varchar, dttstime timestamp, vccity varchar, vcarea varchar, vctsmsg varchar, vctstype varchar, vcaddress varchar, vcnettype varchar, flong float8, flat float8, vcgridid varchar, vcchgrid varchar, inttsnum int8, vcaffectarea varchar, vcyhgrid varchar )location ('${filePath}') format 'csv' (delimiter '|' null '') log errors into err_sales_ext_t segment reject limit 1000 rows
